bibl.title: Reimagining Posidippus.
Peter BING, The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry
bibl.author: BING, Peter

bibl.note: Contribution in√©dite. - "Faced with the sudden quadrupling of his oeuvre, it makes sense to step back for a moment and reevaluate our view of the poet or, better, reimagine him. Who was this Posidippus?"
bibl.seg: Peter BING, The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry (Ann Arbor, 2009) pp. 177-193.
